name: Orbital Engagement
description:
Welcome to the orbital defence simulator, the room you'll be spending the rest of your life, er I mean the next few days in!

Learn how to destroy asteroids with nuclear weapons, even ones that fight back.

I had intended to submit this as a compo entry but ran out of time. Consequently I included the marvelous free music of Evgeny Teilor from Freemusic.com, thanks Evgeny!
